messages.message: Hey! following up on this - I realized that if I have a new workspace, there's no way to switch to it to create a project in it (e.g. there are no projects inside the workspace to click on to switch to the workspace). I think I have to create a workspace in some other workspace first, then move the project to the new workspace

Hey @lydia - we're iterating on designs now cc: @alagu. I do want to note that we are not going to be optimizing for the switching experience and instead optimize for the top nav to allow you to take action on the build project itself. This means that we will expect users to navigate back to workspaces to switch to a different project (consistent with platforms like google drive, figma, etc.)

oh, so should I be going to the workspaces tab to create a project in a different workspace? not clear how to do that on the workspaces tab though. The "Create" button doesn't let me select a workspace
ooo i missed the workspace selection on the left, since it's collapsed
